definition: to tail behind/to tag along/to follow on the heels of
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish
surname Sui
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently

sentences.english: She cleverly got rid of the rogues who followed her, and called the police.
sentences.chinese: 甩脫了尾隨她的小流氓，然後報了警。

sentences.english: China has followed the West selectively since the May 4th Movement in 1919.
sentences.chinese: 自1919五四運動起，中國選擇性地尾隨西方。

sentences.english: After several evenings of this, I followed the children to the dining room.
sentences.chinese: 這樣過來幾個晚上後，我尾隨孩子來到了餐廳。

sentences.english: The news always follows the market.
sentences.chinese: 新聞總是尾隨市場之後。

sentences.english: However, the HMG platoon which followed us did not arrived.
sentences.chinese: 不過，尾隨我們的重炮組沒有到達。

sentences.english: Following the trail with the sureness of a bloodhound, came the general.
sentences.chinese: 就象尾隨追蹤的兇猛獵狗那麼準確，將軍跟了上來。

sentences.english: Arrange iron tiger followed by again, in case of change.
sentences.chinese: 再安排鐵虎再尾隨其後，以防有變。

sentences.english: Faithful grand also at the same time follow at sb' heels and go, think uncover kidnaps and sell dealer this.
sentences.chinese: 忠浩亦同時尾隨而去，想揪出這個拐賣販子。

sentences.english: The eighth route army soldiers odbo following, but discovered by mao-tsair Lin, odbo sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 八路軍戰士老宋尾隨，卻被林茂才發現，老宋犧牲。

sentences.english: And the just man trailed God's messenger.
sentences.chinese: 但見這正直的漢子一路尾隨上帝的信使。

sentences.english: If a fucking dingo follows you home, you should not keep it.
sentences.chinese: 如果一個被激怒的野狗尾隨你到家，你不要收留他。

sentences.english: It follows him all through the streets, then dogs the boy's trail into the schoolroom.
sentences.chinese: 它跟着男孩走街串巷，還尾隨他到教室。

sentences.english: There's a line feed there, and there might be some trailing spaces.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個換行，因此可能有一些尾隨的空格。

sentences.english: People follow you to the bathroom, listen to you pee.
sentences.chinese: 有些人會尾隨你到衛生間，聽你尿尿。

sentences.english: Troops marched XieXiaoZhang tailing found in behind.
sentences.chinese: 部隊行進中發現謝孝彰尾隨在後。
